vsParam:
Ah. Anise Hyssop,
What's going on? Why are you staring at me...

Ah. I'm sorry...
Hmm. I'm just curious...

Hmm. I'm curious about the life of mermaids...
What's it like?

Although I've heard of many legends of mermaids,
I have no idea of your actual life...
Even a fairy feels the same way?

I see.
Let me share with you!

The first thing is that...
we all used to live in the Mermaid Rock.

To be honest, any place in the ocean will do...
Although shoals without strong currents would make life easier for us.
I see. So you live in the shoal most of the time...

Yes. And we all stay together.
It would be very inconvenient if we live alone.

Huh?
Although I once lived alone for some time!

Ha ha ha...
That sounds tough...
So, the last thing is food...

Hehe... We'd attack human boats,
and eat those who fall into the sea...!

Ah. In the legend...
your staple food is fish and seagrass, right?

Gee. It's not every day I tried to scare you guys...
Yeah, you're correct. Ah. So boring.

Ha ha...
That's good... You did scare me...

Hmm... Our life is actually quite ordinary.
But there's one important thing.
For mermaids, the "nourishment of mind" is very important.

"Nourishment of mind"...?
Yeah. You said it before...

Yes. Although it doesn't sound that special,
if we mermaids lose the "nourishment of mind"...

What are you doing?
A letter from Mr. Rod just came.

Uh. From Mr. Rod!?
I want to read it. What does it say??

She's gone... But, what about the "nourishment of mind"...
What on earth is that...

Hmm. She left without telling us the thing we're
most curious about. Let's hear it next time.
